sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: This book assumes that the reader has a reasonable knowledge of using and installing Linux software. Before building an LFS system, we recommend reading the following HOWTOs:

listitem.para: This is a comprehensive guide to building and installing generic Unix software distributions under Linux.
This guide covers the usage of assorted Linux software.

This is an LFS Hint written specifically for users new to Linux. It includes a list of links to excellent sources of information on a wide range of topics. Anyone attempting to install LFS should have an understanding of many of the topics in this hint.
